Package alix.lucene.search

Class SpecifChi2

  • java.lang.Object
    • alix.lucene.search.Specif
      • alix.lucene.search.SpecifChi2
  • public class SpecifChi2
extends Specif
    Implementation of a Chi2 scorer (Pearson) like described by C. Muller (1968)
    Oi = Observation i
    Ei = Expectation i
    ΣOi = ΣEi = N (total of events)
    Chi2 = Σ(Oi - Ei)²/Ei https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chi-squared_test
    Author:
    glorieux-f

        public static double chi2​(double N,
                          double K,
                          double n,
                          double k)
        A 2x2 chi-square value.
        Parameters:
        N - The total number of balls
        K - The number of black balls
        n - The number of balls drawn
        k - The number of black balls drawn
